```{r}

rnorm(n=10, mean = 0, sd = 1)

library(ggplot2)
some_data <- data.frame(observations = rnorm(n=10000, mean = 0, sd = 1),
                        type = "A")

ggplot(some_data, aes(x=observations)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=100, color="black",
                 fill= 'orange')
```
